---
title: "Project Timelines"
output: html_document
---

```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(collapse=TRUE, comment="##")
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = FALSE)
```

For Summer 2018. Timeline visible as an html document that you can view locallyin in your browser, provided you have cloned the repository. 

Hover over items to see people assigned. Scroll up or down over areas in timeline on which you wish to zoom in or out.

Tasks are grouped by rough categories in the left hand column. 

```{r, echo = FALSE, fig.width=9}
library(readxl)
library(timevis)
timelines <- read_excel("timelines.xlsx")

grps <- unique(timelines$group)
timevis(data = timelines, 
        groups = data.frame(id = grps, content = grps))
```
